fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to Nightlock. This only works if the player used their ability on another player the night before. Only one player may be Nightlocked at a time, Freeing the previously Nightlocked player.
- Alternatively, choose a player to Free from Nightlock.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Nightlocked players are alerted that they are locked. For every night afterwards, they will use their ability on the player they visited the night before they were Nightlocked. The locked player also becomes Control and Redirect Immune as long as they are locked.
- If a Nightlocked player’s ability fails for whatever reason (this includes running out of charges), they are Freed.
- If the target of a Nightlocked player dies, the following night they will use their ability on themself and then they are Freed.
- Once all Good-Aligned players have died, you will leave Town. However, Nightlocked players are not Freed.
- **Ethereal**: Your defense only applies to Evil or Neutral roles. Attacks from Good roles bypass your defense unless you’re given defense through other means.
